
Ravi is a village in the Gadchiroli district  with an area of 165.1 hectares, harbouring 151 households and with total population of 625 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town is DESAIGANJ at a distance of > 10 km. 
            
== Educational facilities ==

There are 2 Pre-primary schools in the village
There are 1 Primary schools in the village
The nearest Middle schools is at a distance of < 5 km from the village.
The nearest Secondary schools is at a distance of 5-10 kms from the village.
The nearest Senior secondary schools is at a distance of 5-10 kms from the village.
The nearest Degree colleges of arts  science & commerce is at a distance of 5-10 kms from the village.
The nearest Engineering colleges is at a distance of > 10 km from the village.
The nearest Medical colleges is at a distance of > 10 km from the village.
The nearest Management institutes is at a distance of > 10 km from the village.
The nearest Polytechnics is at a distance of > 10 km from the village.
The nearest Vocational training schools is at a distance of > 10 km from the village.
The nearest Non-formal training centres is at a distance of > 10 km from the village.
The nearest special schools for the disabled is at a distance of > 10 km from the village.


== Medical facilities (Governmental) ==

The nearest Community Health centres is at a distance of 5-10 kms from the village.

== Drinking water ==

Drinking water from taps facility is not available in the village
Drinking water from wells facility is available in the village

== Communication and transport ==

The nearest Post office facility is at a distance of 5-10 kms from the village.
The nearest Sub Post office facility is at a distance of 5-10 kms from the village.
